plot: On Halloween, four twenty-something kids venture into the dilapidated home of a neighborhood legend, known only as "Old Lady Death" - only to discover that there's a very real side to this local tall tale.
title: The House That Cried Blood
plot_es: On Halloween, four twenty-something kids venture into the dilapidated home of a neighborhood legend, known only as "Old Lady Death" - only to discover that there's a very real side to this local tall tale.
plot_en: On Halloween, four twenty-something kids venture into the dilapidated home of a neighborhood legend, known only as "Old Lady Death" - only to discover that there's a very real side to this local tall tale.
